item.title: Project 3: A React Blog Application
item.description: The Application was design using functional React components and React Dom. A REST API with MongoDB was created using Node.js. Then A full MERN Stack(MongoDB, Express, React, Node) was created. MongoDB - document database. Express(.js) - Node.js web framework. React(.js) - a client-side JavaScript framework. Node(.js) - the premier JavaScript web server. A full stack blog Application with a Login and Register Page which help authenticate user. New user can write a post and view.

item.title: Project 2: Text Clsssification Application
item.description: A text data is collected and train to build a model. The model was build using BagOfWords, naive_bayes. A storage database is created using sqlite to store the model built. A created Sqlite functions are created to store, retrieve and view the data. The built model is then used to predict text as software or hardware. The Application has three interface; Home, Manage and About

item.title: Project 1: End To End Emotion Classifier
item.description: For this example project is a Emotion classifier to predict the emotion from text. This could be useful for someone who is new to NLP from a certain country. A model was build using LogisticRegression pipeline. The model was imported using Joblib and the main application was build using streamlit. I was able to get the model to predict the emotion of someone text with 62% accuracy after minimal tuning. For most of the cases this would meet the need of an end user of the app.
